text: Philp is a surname, and may refer to: *Chris Philp (born 1976), British entrepreneur and Conservative Party politician *Geoffrey Philp (born 1958), Jamaican poet, novelist and playwright *Hugh Philp (1786–1856), Scottish golf club maker *James George Philp (1816–1885), English landscape and coastal painter *Peter Philp (1920–2006), Welsh dramatist and antiques expert *Robert Philp (1851–1922), Scottish-Australian businessman and Premier of Queensland *Robert Philp (missionary) (1913–2008), Church of Scotland missionary in Kenya *Tom Philp (1923–1994), Scottish radiologist *Willie Philp, Scottish footballer ==See also== * Philip (name)
title: Philp
